review: Mount & Blade: Warband 8/10I had this game for years outside of steam, But it was SOO FUN that I payed for another copy on steam just because it was on sale, and I LOVE IT SOO MUCH!!!! Its like a historicly accurate skyrim, with multyplayer PvP, and some kingdom management mixed in. it has a nice modding community, an exelent combat system, probably the most fun archery ive ever seen in a medieval game, probably the BEST horse mechanics ive seen in a game, and considerably bad graphics.... with a few bugs, and things that SHOULD be in the game but are not (not that most of these things are easly fixed with mods) the game itself is an 8/10 but if you mod it a bit, you can make it a 10/10. please forgive my spelling.
